amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? LIMITATION ON MILLENNIUM CHALLENGE CORPORATION ASSISTANCE ? SEC. . None of the funds made available in this Act under the heading "MILLENNIUM CHALLENGE CORPORATION" may be used to implement the Northern Zone Investment Plan in El Salvador with respect to the Northern Transnational Highway.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to implement the Northern Zone Investment Plan in El Salvador with respect to the Northern Transnational Highway.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 288 (Roll no. 246).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Kucinich.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 288 (Roll no. 246).
